caption:
"A stainless steel oven with a sleek silver finish and rectangular shape. Features a glass door, control knobs on top, and a handle for opening. Designed for baking and cooking. Positioned in a kitchen setting with cabinets and countertops surrounding it."

"A possibly ceramic container-type object with white coloring and cylindrical shape. Has a narrow neck and wider base. Likely used for holding utensils or as a decorative item. Found on a dining table near chairs and other tableware."
